languages.text: "Эта ложь зашла так далеко, и больше я не могу ей управлять... Правда в том... в том... что все проблемы с логистикой... произошли из-за одной ошибки в цифрах... моей ошибки".

traits.locale_text: "Эта ложь зашла так далеко, и больше я не могу ей управлять... Правда в том, что все проблемы с логистикой и последовавший за ней подрыв торговли и экономики произошли из-за одной ошибки в цифрах... моей ошибки".
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."
languages.original_text: "Эта ложь зашла так далеко, и больше я не могу ей управлять... Правда в том... в том... что все проблемы с логистикой... произошли из-за одной ошибки в цифрах... моей ошибки".

traits.locale_text: "This lie has come too far, and I cannot control it anymore... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single mistake in the numbers... My mistake."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: 「この嘘は行き過ぎています。私はもう黙っていられません…本当は…ほんとは…物流問題は数字のミスで起きたんです…私のミスです」
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「この嘘は行き過ぎています。私はもう黙っていられません…本当は…ほんとは…物流問題は数字のミスで起きたんです…私のミスです」
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: “这个谎言已经越描越黑，再也不受我的控制了……事实……事实是……所有的物流问题，都是由简单的数字错误引起的……都……都是我的错。”
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: “这个谎言已经越描越黑，再也不受我的控制了……事实……事实是……所有的物流问题，都是由简单的数字错误引起的……都……都是我的错。”
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: « Ce mensonge est allé trop loin et est maintenant hors de contrôle... La vérité... c'est que... tous les problèmes de logistique sont le résultat d'une simple erreur dans les chiffres... Une erreur... que j'ai moi-même commise. »
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Ce mensonge est allé trop loin et est maintenant hors de contrôle... La vérité... c'est que... tous les problèmes de logistique sont le résultat d'une simple erreur dans les chiffres... Une erreur... que j'ai moi-même commise. »
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: «Esto se me ha ido de las manos... La verdad es... es... que todos los problemas de logística fueron causa de un único error... Mi error».
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: «Esto se me ha ido de las manos... La verdad es... es... que todos los problemas de logística fueron causa de un único error... Mi error».
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "Diese Lüge ist zu weit gegangen, ich kann sie nicht mehr kontrollieren ... In Wahrheit ... in Wahrheit ... sind all die logistischen Probleme nur durch einen einzigen Rechenfehler entstanden. Meinen Fehler."
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Lüge ist zu weit gegangen, ich kann sie nicht mehr kontrollieren ... In Wahrheit ... in Wahrheit ... sind all die logistischen Probleme nur durch einen einzigen Rechenfehler entstanden. Meinen Fehler."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam

languages.text: "Bu yalanı sürdürdüğümüz yeter. Elden çıktı artık... Hakikat şu ki... Sorunlar... Sorunların hepsi bir hesap hatasından kaynaklı... Bu hatayı da ben yaptım."
languages.original_text: "This lie has gone too far, and I can no longer control it... The truth is... is... that all of the logistical problems were caused by a single error in the numbers... My mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yalanı sürdürdüğümüz yeter. Elden çıktı artık... Hakikat şu ki... sorunlar... sorunların hepsi bir hesap hatasından kaynaklıydı... Bu hatayı da ben yaptım."
traits.speaker: KorneliusDrivesteam
